desc: Introducing Simply Paws®, a healthy, innovative, & eco-friendly cat litter system with superior odor control & low maintenance. Simply Paws® is healthy & safe for cats, kittens, people & the planet. 100% natural litter is biodegradable, low tracking, 99% dust-free, & fragrance-free. Litter lasts 30 days for one cat!

layout.text: Simply Paws® Natural Cat Litter System
Superior Odor Control | Less Mess & Maintenance | Sustainable
